markdown: '''{{PAGENAME}}''' is a [task](/pillarsOfEternityIiDeadfireQuestsTasks/) in {{poe2}}. ## Synopsis Nemnok asked that I retrieve three grimoires of power from beyond the Drowned Barrows . The written instructions spell out which books Nemnok desires - a grimoire from a swamp witch, one from a fampyr lord, and another from an ancient lich. It's up to me to track them down in the Deadfire. ## Walkthrough This quest is an extension of the quest [Nemnok the Devourer](/nemnokTheDevourerQuest/). The goal is to collect the three grimoires at the following locations: * [Bipara's Grimoire](/biparasGrimoire/): Found on [Outcast's Respite](/outcastsRespite/) to the west of the Drowned Barrows. Carried by [Bipara](/bipara/). * [Brawler's Grimoire](/brawlersGrimoire/): Found inside the [flooded cave](/floodedCave/) (4째 34' S, 65째 18' E). Carried by the ancient lich battlemage. * [Menzzago's Grimoire](/menzzagosGrimoire/): Found on [Splintered Reef](/splinteredReef/). Carried by [Menzzago](/menzzago/). For each grimoire you return, you'll be allowed to pick a reward from Nemnok's hoard. The rewards are: * [Mundane Shell](/mundaneShell/) * [Chromoprismatic Quarterstaff](/chromoprismaticQuarterstaff/) * [Veilpiercer](/veilpiercer/) ## Notes * Killing Nemnok after turning in the quest will not make the grimoires drop. ## Journal {| class="wikitable" ! colspan="3" style="word-break:break-all" | Quests/28_Drowned_Barrows/28_TSK_Books_of_Power.quest |- ! width="40px" | {{tooltip|ID|Objectives: 0, Descriptions: 10000, Addenda: 20000, End states: 30000, Alternate descriptions: 40000}} ! colspan="2" | Objectives |- | rowspan="2" style="vertical-align:text-top; text-align:center" | '''0''' | colspan="2" | '''The Lost Grimoires''' |- | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 10000 | Nemnok asked that I retrieve three grimoires of power from beyond the Drowned Barrows . The written instructions spell out which books Nemnok desires - a grimoire from a swamp witch, one from a fampyr lord, and another from an ancient lich. It's up to me to track them down in the Deadfire. |- | rowspan="3" style="vertical-align:text-top; text-align:center" | '''1''' | colspan="2" | '''Bring Bipara's grimoire to Nemnok.''' |- | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 10001 | Bipara's grimoire is mine. Nemnok will want this returned to the lowest level of the Drowned Barrows. |- | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 20000 | I have returned Bipara's grimoire. Nemnok allowed me to choose a reward from the hoard at the base of the statue. |- | rowspan="3" style="vertical-align:text-top; text-align:center" | '''2''' | colspan="2" | '''Bring Menzzago's grimoire to Nemnok.''' |- | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 10002 | Now that Manzzago's grimoire is in my hands, Nemnok will like to see it returned to the lowest level of the Drowned Barrows. |- | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 20001 | I have returned Menzzago's grimoire. Nemnok allowed me to choose a reward from the hoard at the base of the statue. |- | rowspan="3" style="vertical-align:text-top; text-align:center" | '''3''' | colspan="2" | '''Bring the Brawler's grimoire to Nemnok.''' |- | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 10003 | The Brawler's grimoire is mine. Nemnok will want it returned to the lowest level of the Drowned Barrows. |- | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 20002 | I have returned the Brawler's grimoire. Nemnok allowed me to choose a reward from the hoard at the base of the statue. |- | rowspan="2" style="vertical-align:text-top; text-align:center" | '''9''' | colspan="2" | '''Retrieve the swamp witch's grimoire''' |- | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 10009 | This grimoire is said to be in the clutches of an old woman in a far-flung swamp hut. |- | rowspan="2" style="vertical-align:text-top; text-align:center" | '''10''' | colspan="2" | '''Retrieve the fampyr lord's grimoire.''' |- | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 10010 | This grimoire belongs to an undead spellcaster who resides in a 'graveyard of listing ships.' |- | rowspan="2" style="vertical-align:text-top; text-align:center" | '''11''' | colspan="2" | '''Retrieve the ancient lich's grimoire.''' |- | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 10011 | This grimoire can be found in a lich's well-hidden library somewhere in the Deadfire. |- ! colspan="3" | End states |- | style="text-align:center" | {{cross}} | style="vertical-align: text-top" | 30000 | I killed Nemnok. |- | style="text-align:center" | {{check}} | style="vertical-align: text-top" | 30001 | I retrieved all three grimoires for Nemnok. He is pleased with me. |}
